                                                                                                                                             Lilly Faculty Registry
                                                                                                                                                     Payments Made in 2009


The Lilly Faculty Registry reports direct and indirect payments by Lilly, as well as Lilly’s portion of alliance partnership payments, to health care professionals serving as faculty members. When the "Entity Paid" is a company, hospital or university, and there is a different name listed as the service provider, it
reflects an indirect payment which may or may not actually have been received in whole or in part by the listed service provider. In this PDF version of the report, all dollar values have been rounded to the nearest whole dollar.
